item.title: Aeh add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Aeh add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "Our stories may be singular, but our destination is shared." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Aeh add a quote by Barack Obama
item.description: "The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Don’t wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope." -- Barack Obama

item.title: Aeh add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "When we are born, when we enter this world, it is as if we signed a pact for the rest of our life, but a day may come when we will ask ourselves Who signed this on my behalf?" -- José Saramago

item.title: Aeh add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "We use words to understand each other and even, sometimes, to find each other." -- José Saramago

item.title: Aeh add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "Men are all the same, they think that because they came out of the belly of a woman they know all there is to know about women." -- José Saramago

item.title: Aeh add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous
